member.name: IMFTimedTextTrackList.GetLength
member.summary: Gets the length, in tracks, of the timed-text-track list.
member.returns: Returns the length, in tracks, of the timed-text-track list.

member.name: IMFTimedTextTrackList.GetTrack
member.summary: Gets a text track in the list from the index of the track.
member.param: The index of the track in the list to retrieve.
A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface for the timed-text track.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextTrackList.GetTrackById
member.summary: Gets a text track in the list from the identifier of the track.
member.param: The identifier of the track in the list to retrieve.
A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface for the timed-text track.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextTrackList
member.summary: Represents a list of timed-text tracks.
